name: SOS 5.3.1 Release
body:
Available in [Maven Central](https://search.maven.org/search?q=g:org.n52.sensorweb-server.sos%20and%20v:5.3.1).

## Change Log
* Fix SOS reset 
* Add profile and trjectory rofile insert result (template) examples for pox
* Update to sql server 2012 dialect
* Add cache uptime time as extension to GetCapabilities response (#342)
* Add upper limit for login attempts in a given time frame (#291)
* Add some dowload statistic badges
* Fix dbquery creation for feature cache update

### Dependency Updates
* Bump mockito-core from 3.4.6 to 3.5.0
* Bump cargo-maven2-plugin from 1.7.16 to 1.8.0
* Bump postgresql from 42.2.14 to 42.2.15 
* Bump version.elasticsearch from 7.8.1 to 7.9.0
* Bump mockito-core from 3.5.0 to 3.5.2 
* Bump spotbugs-annotations from 4.1.1 to 4.1.2 
* Bump mockito-core from 3.5.2 to 3.5.5
* Bump postgresql from 42.2.15 to 42.2.16 
* Bump mockito-core from 3.5.5 to 3.5.6
* Bump mockito-core from 3.5.6 to 3.5.7 
* Bump Saxon-HE from 10.1 to 10.2
* Bump version.db-model from 3.0.1 to 3.0.2
* Bump jts-core from 1.16.1 to 1.17.1 
* Bump mssql-jdbc from 8.4.0.jre8 to 8.4.1.jre8 
* Bump mockito-core from 3.5.7 to 3.5.9
* Bump mockito-core from 3.5.9 to 3.5.10
* Bump version.elasticsearch from 7.9.0 to 7.9.1 
* Bump version.springframework.security from 5.3.4.RELEASE to 5.4.0
* Bump commons-io from 2.7 to 2.8.0
* Bump version.springframework from 5.2.8.RELEASE to 5.2.9.RELEASE 
* Bump cargo-maven2-plugin from 1.8.0 to 1.8.1
* Bump mockito-core from 3.5.10 to 3.5.11 
* Bump byte-buddy from 1.10.14 to 1.10.15
* Bump version.geotools from 23.2 to 24.0
* Bump arctic-sea from 8.0.1 to 8.0.2
* Bump byte-buddy from 1.10.15 to 1.10.16
* Bump version.elasticsearch from 7.9.1 to 7.9.2
* Bump spotbugs-annotations from 4.1.2 to 4.1.3
* Bump mockito-core from 3.5.11 to 3.5.13
* Bump cargo-maven2-plugin from 1.8.1 to 1.8.2 
* Update dao-impl to version 3.4.1
* Bump version.jackson from 2.11.2 to 2.11.3
* Bump jetty-maven-plugin from 9.4.31.v20200723 to 9.4.32.v20200930
* Bump version.db-model from 3.0.3-SNAPSHOT to 3.0.3

### Breaking Changes
* None

See [here](https://github.com/52North/sos/compare/v5.3.0...v5.3.1) for the complete commit log.
